column4: so, I tried upgrading to hoary from warty, but I don't quite things worked all the way. I have gotten past any errors resulting from my sourcs.list, but now when I try to run synaptics, and mark all upgrades.... it's not marking all upgrades. It shows them as upgradeable, but not marked for the upgrade.
any suggestions?
any suggestions why synaptics recognizes upgradeable packages, but won't mark them for upgrading?
: The upgrade cause a bigish conflict
is there a way around this without reinstalling?
I have not been able to find hardly anything on the forums about this
: Why do you need to upgrade?
I was goign to try to get some of the new gnome layout and stuff that is in hoary. i am still (sort of) on warty at the moment
thanks, I wasn't sure what the direct way to getting to synaptics was
: You should either use warty or hoary, not a combo
: Try installing each package manually in Synaptic and see where the error comes in
I am trying to get to hoary. :) I have hoary for my sources
hmm... it just doesn't make sense that it wouldn't mark them when I tell it to mark all upgrades
but I guess I will go through manually this time and then see what happens in the future
: You probably have something non-standard installed
oh well, maybe I will just do a reinstall. I have the media here
: Mark for upgrade and then manually do the rest. You will reach a point where it says it wont because of package XYZ
Xine seems to have major issues
maybe I will try removing it and then adding it
: Remove it. You can just install it again later
k. I will go from here. I guess I didn't realize to what extent the upgrade broke some things. there's not much in the forums I could find either
thansk
: Good luck. Should work out alright in the end
